name: SpaceHook Championship
description:
We are a group of 3 friends making games. SpaceHook Championship is our first game together. If you ever encounter a bug or have an idea to improve the game experience, feel free to tell us about it in the comments !

Team :

Martin Chauveau - Game designer, artist and programmer
Benjamin Peltier - Game designer and gameplay programmer
Florentin Peters - Game designer, programmer and composer

Additional contributions : 

Lucas Friche - Sound design

Controls

A controller is required to play this game.

How to play

Use your grappling hook to grab onto a platform and propel yourself on your friends. The faster you go, the more damage you deal !

Install instructions

The game comes in a .zip file. Extract all the files and run Space Hook Championship.exe to play !
